metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000004 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel 4.12, 3.10, 2.6 and possibly earlier versions a race condition vulnerability exists in the sound system, this can lead to a deadlock and denial of service condition. Luo Quan and Wei Yang discovered that a race condition existed in the Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) subsystem of the Linux kernel when handling ioctl()s. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system deadlock).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000004` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
